GPS seems to be disabled. Please enable GPS fist.
This application will keep your GPS active for the next %s minutes.
This raises power consumption slightly but solves common problem of losing GPS fix when switching between non-GPS and some GPS-using apps. For source code and more details see app page on GitHub.
